subject: add TZ_SYS_USER_SHARED_ENTRY to support
commitMessage:
add TZ_SYS_USER_SHARED_ENTRY to support

creating state Shared entry directories in $HOME.

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

(1 comment)

I think this file should not be modified.

There are many user shared folders, not just 'content' folder.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

I agree with corentin, what content? document? image? video? ... 

the directory $HOME/content is surely not the solution

let study the problem and continue the discussion before
